database.name: VIEW AD_PROCESS_EXECUTION_V
database.view: SELECT rn.ad_process_run_id, rn.ad_client_id, rn.ad_org_id, rn.isactive, rn.created, rn.createdby, rn.updated, rn.updatedby, rq.ad_user_id, rn.status, rn.start_time, rn.end_time, rn.runtime, rn.log, rn.result, rq.params, rn.report, rq.channel, rq.isrolesecurity, rq.ad_process_id, rn.ad_process_request_id FROM ad_process_run rn LEFT JOIN ad_process_request rq ON rn.ad_process_request_id = rq.ad_process_request_id
